org.kkevin.sdudaemon.configuration
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  org.kkevin.sdudaemon.configuration.Configuration

public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object

This class stores project configuration Each configuration consists of scraper recycler and updater definitions. The scraper shall provide simple data fetching ability The recycler is a user defined program which reads files the scraper created, and transforms them into a format processible by the database updater The updater provides a database interface, and reads data the recycler creates, and store its bare content into a database. The database is defined by a server and authentication credentials. Once data loaded and recycled the updater reads every existing row from the list and updates it. If necessary the table will be altered too.

Constructor Detail

Configuration

public Configuration(java.lang.String configPath,
                     java.lang.String dumpPath,
                     java.lang.String statePath)
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     org.jdom.JDOMException,
                     java.lang.Exception
Create configuration and creating necessary project paths. All paths are requested to be writable and accessible. Exceptions are thrown otherwise.

Parameters:
configPath - path to the project configuration
dumpPath - path to the place where each projects data is stored
statePath - each project consists of subroutines whose states of execution needed to be known
Throws:
java.io.IOException
org.jdom.JDOMException
java.lang.Exception
